Package poker

Class RangePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.Range
      • poker.RangePlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulatedPlayer
    public class RangePlayer
extends Range
implements SimulatedPlayer
    A representation of an opposing player who possesses a given range instead of a specific hand Subclass of range due to ease
    Author:
    brendansullivan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RangePlayer()
      Constructs the player with an empty range
      RangePlayer​(int n)
      Constructs the player with the top n% of hands in a normal-sized game
      RangePlayer​(Range r)
      Constructs the player holding a specific range
